name: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc.
description: Invesco Mortgage Capital Inc. is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in investing in and managing a diversified portfolio of mortgage-related assets. Founded in 2010 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, the company focuses primarily on acquiring and managing residential and commercial mortgage-backed securities (MBS), as well as mortgage loans and other related assets. Invesco Mortgage Capital aims to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns for its investors through its disciplined investment strategy, which is underpinned by the extensive experience and expertise of its management team in the mortgage finance sector. The company maintains a strong commitment to maintaining a conservative capital structure while actively managing its portfolio to maximize shareholder value. Invesco Mortgage Capital is part of the broader Invesco Ltd. family, which offers a wide range of investment solutions, including mutual funds, ETFs, and other investment products. With a focus on transparency and effective risk management, Invesco Mortgage Capital is dedicated to delivering sustainable long-term growth for its investors.
